mapper.select: SELECT t1.username FROM users t1 INNER JOIN users_detail t2 ON t1.id = t2.user_id WHERE t2.email = #{email};
SELECT t1.username FROM users t1 INNER JOIN users_detail t2 ON t1.id = t2.user_id WHERE t2.phone_number = #{phone_number};
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = #{username}) AS RESULT;
SELECT EXISTS(Select phone_number from users_detail where phone_number = #{phone}) AS RESULT;
SELECT EXISTS(Select email from users_detail where email = #{email}) AS RESULT;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(username, password, enabled, accountnonexpired, accountnonlocked, credentialsnonexpired) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{accountNonExpired}, #{accountNonLocked}, #{credentialsNonExpired});

UPDATE users_detail SET email=#{email} where user_id = #{user_id}; INSERT INTO users_detail(user_id, email) SELECT #{user_id}, #{email} WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users_detail WHERE user_id = #{user_id});

UPDATE users_detail SET phone_number=#{phone} where user_id = #{user_id}; INSERT INTO users_detail(user_id, phone_number) SELECT #{user_id}, #{phone} WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users_detail WHERE user_id = #{user_id});
